newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Sverdlovenergo pretax profit falls to 744 bln rbls.
newsitem.headline: Sverdlovenergo pretax profit falls to 744 bln rbls.

text.p: NOTE: Full company name is AO Sverdlovenergo. Face value of shares is 1,000 roubles. Annual shareholders' meeting on May 16.

Accounts prepared to Russian accounting standards on a cash basis. Russian standards differ significantly from those normally supplied in the West. Russian accounts are designed to meet the requirements of the tax authorities. Definitions of profit and assets differ significantly from those in the West, and converting Russian accounts to international standards can turn a profit into a loss.
Figures are not adjusted for inflation or the depreciation of the rouble, but the following data may be helpful.
Dollar on Moscow Interbank Currency Exchange (MICEX):
Sverdlovenergo's primary shareholder is Unified Energy System (UES) which controls 49 percent of shares. Foreign investors hold 25.63 percent and domestic investors hold the remaining 25.37 percent.
